g:Label.text: My Diet is best described as:

g:HTMLPanel.p: Please check the box if you require a gluten free diet.

g:HTMLPanel.h2: Do you have other dietary restriction(s) we need to be aware of?
g:HTMLPanel.p: Please enter the name(s) of any SERIOUS food related condition(s) in the box. Please do not enter "No", to tell us you have no restrictions; leaving the box blank serves that purpose. Please enter only the name of each condition, separated by a comma. Please, NO sentences describing conditions, as lengthy responses mess with the readability of our automated reports. We will contact you if we don't recognize the name of your condition.
Also, don't enter foods you just don't like or that you avoid. It will be your job to avoid or pick around your unliked food item on playa.
Good example: Diabetic, Strawberry Allergy, Lactose Intollerant.
Bad examples: I have been type 2 Diabetic since I was 5, I don't like onions, Green beans give me gass."
